predicate.note: Frames file for 'unravel' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: ergative
example.text: That's the primary reason the company's share price has held up so well when, in Mr. Smith's words, ``most companies would have unraveled'' by now.

example.name: agentive
example.text: But the specter of Ford eventually launching a full-fledged bid could unravel the GM-Jaguar talks.
example.arg: the specter of Ford eventually launching a full-fledged bid
